contest-event.event-date:
June 21, 2015 D Kirkby Lonsdale Contest
Kirkby Lonsdale Contest 0 March, Hymn and Own Choice Test Piece Contest
kirkby-lonsdale-contest
Market Square, Kirkby Lonsdale, Cumbria, England, UK Deportment adjudicator: John Knewstubb.
Prizes: Deportment Prize "Pam Ogden Trophy" - Pilling Jubilee Silver Best soloist "The David French Trophy" Simon Cowen - Greenalls Brass Band Best Entertainment "The Kirkby Lonsdale Cup" - Greenalls Brass Band Best March "The Gorden Holmes Trophy" - Greenalls Brass Band Best Hymn "The Geoffrey Tempest Trophy" - Greenalls Brass Band Highest placed 4th Section Band "The Lunesdale Trophy" £50 Tarleton and District 3rd Prize "The Tom Peak Trophy" £75 - Pilling Jubilee Silver 2nd Prize "The Sedgwick Trophy" £100 - Littleborough Brass 1st Prize "The Simmy Hartley Trophy" £150 - Greenalls Brass Band Winning Conductor "The E.V. Greenwood Trophy" Greenalls Brass Band - Philip Boardman
June 23, 2015, 8:33 a.m. Sept. 9, 2015, 3:06 p.m.
1 Greenalls Band Philip Boardman
2 Littleborough Band Adrian Woodhead
3 Pilling Jubilee Silver Band Len Charnock
4 Tarleton and District Brass Gillian Bould
6 Giggleswick and Settle Ben Tierney
Unknown Result Denton Brass Matthew Bailey
Unknown Result Poynton Youth Mike Eccles
